Question Text: Henry Ford Health System Race Ethnicity Combination
Variable Label: Henry Ford Health System Race Ethnicity Combination
Format/Value: African American/Black and Hispanic or Latino
African American/Black and not Hispanic or Latino
Caucasian/White and not Hispanic or Latino
Other (Hispanic, Asian, American Indian/Alaskan Native, Native Hawaiian or Pacific Islander) and Hispanic or Latino
Other (Hispanic, Asian, American Indian/Alaskan Native, Native Hawaiian or Pacific Islander) and not Hispanic or Latino
Other (Hispanic, Asian, American Indian/Alaskan Native, Native Hawaiian or Pacific Islander) and Ethnicity Unavailable/Unknown
Race Unavailable/Unknown and Ethnicity Hispanic or Latino
Race Unavailable/Unknown and Ethnicity not Hispanic or Latino
Derivation Notes: RcrtSI_HFHSRE_v1r0 equals 0 if RcrtSI_HFHSRace_v1r0 equals 0 and RcrtSI_HFHSEthnicity equals 0
RcrtSI_HFHSRE_v1r0 equals 1 if RcrtSI_HFHSRace_v1r0 equals 0 and RcrtSI_HFHSEthnicity equals 1
RcrtSI_HFHSRE_v1r0 equals 2 if RcrtSI_HFHSRace_v1r0 equals 0 and RcrtSI_HFHSEthnicity equals 77
RcrtSI_HFHSRE_v1r0 equals 3 if RcrtSI_HFHSRace_v1r0 equals 1 and RcrtSI_HFHSEthnicity equals 0
RcrtSI_HFHSRE_v1r0 equals 4 if RcrtSI_HFHSRace_v1r0 equals 1 and RcrtSI_HFHSEthnicity equals 1
RcrtSI_HFHSRE_v1r0 equals 5 if RcrtSI_HFHSRace_v1r0 equals 1 and RcrtSI_HFHSEthnicity equals 77
RcrtSI_HFHSRE_v1r0 equals 6 if RcrtSI_HFHSRace_v1r0 equals 2 and RcrtSI_HFHSEthnicity equals 0
RcrtSI_HFHSRE_v1r0 equals 7 if RcrtSI_HFHSRace_v1r0 equals 2 and RcrtSI_HFHSEthnicity equals 1
RcrtSI_HFHSRE_v1r0 equals 8 if RcrtSI_HFHSRace_v1r0 equals 2 and RcrtSI_HFHSEthnicity equals 77
RcrtSI_HFHSRE_v1r0 equals 9 if RcrtSI_HFHSRace_v1r0 equals 77 and RcrtSI_HFHSEthnicity equals 0
RcrtSI_HFHSRE_v1r0 equals 10 if RcrtSI_HFHSRace_v1r0 equals 77 and RcrtSI_HFHSEthnicity equals 1
RcrtSI_HFHSRE_v1r0 equals 77 if RcrtSI_HFHSRace_v1r0 equals 77 and RcrtSI_HFHSEthnicity equals 77
